about_the_game:
Fast tanks with big guns, battle across cartoon lands where a shadow grows waiting for a player to return. Battle through challenging arenas from green ancient lands of forests and sheep to bubbling swamps where the undead lurk.




- The once heroic champions will battle to stop you changing the fate of their lands. Discover what happened in this colourful, fun world where something grows and many secrets stay hidden until a player returns...

- Fully voiced narration for both in-game and the steadily revealing story. The narrator is both ally and guide through this mysterious realm.




Customisation
Customise your tank as you unlock designs and decals on your journey. A wide range of customisation is available with overlaying patterns, designs and decals. Each land’s champion also has their own tank and decals to unlock and AI personality to challenge your growing skill.

Multiplayer
In Multiplayer challenge players in online PvP or split screen couch. Show off your abilities and your tank whilst ranking up to reach the Hall of Fame. Play in arenas across any of the wide variety of lands at day or night. Responsive controls and arcade style handling for performing jumps, stunts and skilled driving.



Battle Gameplay
GUNS’N’WHEELS is a skilled battle between two tanks and the flag. Hold the flag for as long as you can before you die, death can be quick and often. Be the first to hold the flag long enough to win the round. The first to Two rounds wins the battle..... easy..... good luck player
Play with gamepad or keyboard and mouse.



VR and Non-VR.
Both Singleplayer and Multiplayer can be played in VR or Standard Flatscreen Non-VR and switch if you want during the journey. Online PvP can be played in VR or Standard Flatscreen Non-VR. Full support for multiplayer cross play between VR and Flatscreen Non-VR.



Night Gameplay
Play and customise at night for extra challenging gameplay.
Want to see how you shine at night then customise your tank in the night garage



Powerful Pickups - Bouncing bullets, triple fire, rapid fire, homing missiles, grenade, shields and more to come.
Responsive controls and arcade style handling for performing jumps, stunts and skilled driving. That doesn’t guarantee landing safely though.
Watch out you don’t get distracted chasing sheep or destroying houses, its the fastest way to die.

name: Guns'N'Wheels

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980, AMD Radeon Rx 580, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus or HTC Vive PC. Keyboard or gamepad required
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset is optional not Required to play in Non-VR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 3.1+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus or HTC Vive PC. Keyboard or gamepad required
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset is optional not Required to play in Non-VR

short_description: Fast tanks with big guns. Arena Based, Vehicular Combat. Play Singleplayer story mode or compete in Multiplayer high skill battles, unlocking arenas, tanks and decals. Rank up to be crowned a Legend. Play in Single player, Online PvP or Split screen.
